extendedInfo.description: App for Osho Quotes In todayâs, fast and hectic lifestyle, it is very hard to get peace for your life and soul. A spiritual guru can help you in finding your way in your life and enlightening your soul. Claruss App has deigned an app on Osho to help you in finding the true meaning of life and relations.Osho: IntroductionChandra Mohan jain, also known as Acharya Rajneesh from the 1960s onward, as Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh, during the 1970s to 80s and as Osho from 1989. Osho was a popular Indian mystic, guru and spiritual teacher who can make you live a fulfilled life. Our Osho iPhone app has covered all famous and memorable life quotes given by spiritual guru. Apart from listing all great quotes, we have also added many other options such as send, share or email the quotes about life, love or relationship  to help people knowing their real potential, who you really are.Share via SMSApart from covering all popular Oshoâs quotes, we also allow our users to share the life quotes via SMS. You can choose the quote, create a bunch of quotes and send it to your favorite numbers.  This Osho app is extremely simple, easy and user-friendly.Mail It your GroupYou can send the quotes to your friends and business group through email.. Just choose the option of mail, enter the email address and tap the send button.  By sending an amazing quote daily, you will help your friends to access their inner powerhouse of cautiousness.Update it on Social MediaSocial media has emerged a fastest-growing platform to make friends and expand your circle. You can impress your circle by sharing Osho quotes and thoughts and make new friends.Claruss App is always known to introduce creative apps that can help you in real life in multiple ways. Download Osho quote app now and add more worth to your life..

reviews.title: A journey from inside
reviews.comment: Osho always inspired me. He was the thinker of the century... no one would ever visit on this earth having the same ideology. He was different, unmatched n superb....great collection indeed...
reviews.author: Pramod shanker Soni

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thanks for such life inspiring phrases of Osho. Can u make an app with phrases of Bhagwan Mahavira?
reviews.author: Vinodh Kumar

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I cant expresss in words the impact he made on my life...
reviews.author: ankur jindal
